message: I think his palindrome poem summarizes the dude pretty well: http://mixedlollies.wordpress.com/2008/02/15/dammit-im-mad-a-poem-by-demetri-martin/
Really clever dude with some not very obvious jokes... The intro to his show Important Things with D. Martin always gets a laugh out of me. What's your fav skit?
uau, não ouvia falar deste gajo desde o windows vista com a campanha 'clearification' http://www.youtube.com/user/clearification?blend=1&ob=4
not really familiar with his work, I just remember him from the vista promo website

Here's a set of videos from youtube... (there are 6 parts) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mKnzPHtf9u4&feature=youtube_gdata_player hmmmm... I need to find some dvd's of him. He's too funny not to support.
